rule.name: CASE_APP_CustomerDashboard
rule.description: This is the SAIL for the Customer Dashboard for the CASE APP. It contains basic customer information.
rule.definition: = load( local!c: #"_a-0000d9b9-6309-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2115"(cid:ri!cid), local!shippingAddr:fn!stripwith(fn!concat( local!c.ShippingAddress.Address,", ", local!c.ShippingAddress.City,", ", local!c.ShippingAddress.State,", ", local!c.ShippingAddress.ZIP,", ", local!c.ShippingAddress.Country ),"'"), local!billingAddr:fn!stripwith(fn!concat( local!c.BillingAddress.Address,", ", local!c.BillingAddress.City,", ", local!c.BillingAddress.State,", ", local!c.BillingAddress.ZIP,", ", local!c.BillingAddress.Country ),"'"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dashboardLayout"( firstColumnContents: { #"_a-0000d9b9-6309-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2134"(c:local!c), #"_a-0000d9b9-6309-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_2142"(c:local!c), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Customer Locations", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"( label:"Shipping Address", labelPosition:"ADJACENT", value:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.ShippingAddress.Address, style:"EMPHASIS"), ", "&char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.ShippingAddress.City, style:"EMPHASIS"), ", ", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.ShippingAddress.State, style:"EMPHASIS"), ", ", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.ShippingAddress.ZIP, style:"EMPHASIS"), ","&char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.ShippingAddress.Country, style:"EMPHASIS") } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"( label:"Map", labelPosition:"ADJACENT", links:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_safeLink"(label:"View address on map", uri:#"_a-0000d513-8ab8-8000-3ca7-0a000064044c_20749"(local!shippingAddr)) ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"( label:"Billing Address", labelPosition:"ADJACENT", value:{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.BillingAddress.Address, style:"EMPHASIS"), ", "&char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.BillingAddress.City, style:"EMPHASIS"), ", ", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.BillingAddress.State, style:"EMPHASIS"), ", ", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.BillingAddress.ZIP, style:"EMPHASIS"), ","&char(10), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem"(text:local!c.BillingAddress.Country, style:"EMPHASIS") } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"( label:"Map", labelPosition:"ADJACENT", links:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_safeLink"(label:"View address on map", uri:#"_a-0000d513-8ab8-8000-3ca7-0a000064044c_20749"(local!billingAddr)) ) } ) } ) )
